announcements.title: N/A
announcements.content: To ensure the safety and privacy of all staff members, sharing personal social media accounts (including but not limited to WhatsApp, TikTok, Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, etc.) with other staff, community members, or other external parties that are involved in our community is strictly prohibited. This policy is in place to protect our staff from potential risks and maintain professional boundaries. If you are seen to be exploiting this policy it can result in an immediate removal from our team.
